title: Double Ip Weekend
body: So... is that happening again? and If so, then is it gonna be the same time as last year? BECAUSE I MISSED IT!!!! (kind of a mis representation, I hadn't started playing yet then)

replies.body: They'll have one again eventually. They're every handful of months or so.

NOOOO!

I WANNA BE THE VERY BEST
LIKE NOONE EVER WAS
TO CATCH THEM IS MY REAL TEST
TO TRAIN THEM IS MY CAUSE!
